text: Needful Things is a 1993 American horror movie directed by Fraser Clarke Heston and was based on the 1991 novel of the same name by Stephen King. It stars Ed Harris, Max von Sydow, Bonnie Bedelia, Amanda Plummer, J. T. Walsh, Shane Meier, Don S. Davis and W. Morgan Sheppard. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1993 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Maine Category:Movies based on books by Stephen King
title: Needful Things (movie)
